item.description:
SGRA will be having a Forum in the Fairfield Public Library.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/new/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=113:march-meeting--fairfield-library&catid=34:sgra-information

It will be in one of their conference rooms.

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org/calendar/month.php

12 to 1 SGRA Org Meeting

1 to 2 PM Go over upcoming events, esp but
Not limited to the June Paracon.

2 to 3 SGRA Investigations

From 3 to 4:30 PM there will be a lecture by Philip Imbrogno
Who has investigated the Hudson Valley UFO case.

He will be discussing his various investigations.

He will be promoting his newest book;

Interdimensional Universe: The New Science of UFOs, Paranormal
Phenomena and Otherdimensional Beings

http://www.amazon.com...

www.amazon.com/s?ie=UTF8&search-type=ss&index=books&field-author=Philip%20J.%20Imbrogno&page=1

Fairfield Library:

http://www.fairfieldp...

www.fairfieldpubliclibrary.org/

http://www.fairfieldp...

www.fairfieldpubliclibrary.org/directions.htm

Please let me know if you want to car pool to the event.

We should leave between 11:30 to 12:00 to get there and find
Parking in time for the 1:00 Forum.

I hit the Copy button before when I should have
Hit the Edit button. Copy event is cancelled.
Edit is making some revisions to the original event
memo.

SGRA has brought some issues to my attention.
My way of handling those issues is to have this memo in all
SGRA Meet Ups in 2009.
SGRA Events ARE NOT TOTALLY FREE.
They have raffle and meal tickets that cost money.
Some events have booklets that cost money.
SGRA and the Vendors sell products that cost money.
Psychics and others give readings that cost money.
You can go on their site of

http://www.sgra-media...

www.sgra-media.org

For more details and some things can be
Purchased on line.

SGRA asks for a donation for attending some of their events.
(Yea, I know. You can talk to them about the difference between
a donation and charging admission. I am not getting involved.)

SGRA has brought to my attention that some of my members
Have gone to SGRA Events. They told SGRA that I said
That my members do not have to pay for anything at the
SGRA Events. I really do not know what they are talking
About because none of my members have come to me
With this issue.

If I continue to receive complaints, then I will cease and desist in
Creating Meet Ups for SGRA Events.

If necessary, as much as I enjoy going to SGRA Events, it is
Not worth reading about the complains and issues.
I will end my involvement with SGRA as well.


Mike B
Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my purple back pack.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone will learn about Hudson Valley UFOs on 3/28
